meanings.definition: The youngest child in a family.
meanings.sent1: The lastborn in the family is always the baby.
meanings.sent2: My little sister is the lastborn in our family.
meanings.sent3: The lastborn gets away with everything because they're the youngest.
meanings.sent4: Being the lastborn means you have older siblings to look up to.
meanings.sent5: The lastborn brings joy and laughter to the family.

meanings.definition: The final or most recent born in a group.
meanings.sent1: The lastborn of the litter was the smallest but the most energetic.
meanings.sent2: She is the lastborn of all the cousins.
meanings.sent3: The lastborn of the team surprised everyone with their skills.
meanings.sent4: As the lastborn, he felt the pressure to live up to his siblings' achievements.
meanings.sent5: The lastborn always brings a fresh perspective to the group.
